excerpt: "On Aug. 30, Hawaii Business Magazine gathered local experts on artificial intelligence to discuss AI in Hawai‘i at Mid-Pacific Institute’s Bakken Auditorium before an audience of students, educators and other adults. This is a condensed and lightly edited version of that discussion, which I moderated."
